title: I need Shaco tips
body:
I recently added Shaco to my champ pool. Can some one give me any good tips with Shaco or at least a current link to a Shaco guide/ tips for someone just picking him up? 

I generally do well early game but fail at ganks and have some trouble farming after early game.

Thanks.

replies.body: Honestly, watch Shaclone, he is a challenger SHaco one trick pony, usually answer questions you ask as well

To add to this: You can find him on youtube and streaming in Twitch.

[](https://www.youtube.com/user/Shaclone)
True was middle of shit for college and may have not finished the comment...#College=SleepDeprived

Using your Q ability to hop over walls is probably what makes Shaco the strongest. Midlaners generally ward the bushes on either side of the river, so Q-ing over a midlane wall to avoid those wards usually works out pretty well.

Use boxes to help in the jungle, to screw with the enemy in their jungle or to provide/prevent escape in teamfights.

Use your Shiv (E) AFTER your Q.

Shaco's ult is good for splitpushing and doing burst damage in a gank or teamfight. Only use it when pushing towers or facing an enemy champion.

Shaco's my favorite champ, but do your best to end the game early if you get fed. He can 1v1 just about anyone lategame but can only get 1, MAYBE 2 kills in teamfights before dying. He's not a great jungler to "carry" lategame.
Thanks guys. Question about the the Q + E combo. Do I Q, AA, then E, or just straight do Q then E?

> [{quoted}](name=hkd001,realm=NA,application-id=WEuoGbmp,discussion-id=6ks8HOwz,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2015-02-25T15:33:07.194+0000)
>
> Thanks guys. Question about the the Q + E combo. Do I Q, AA, then E, or just straight do Q then E?

save your e for spike damage or if they are to far away to AA to prok the slow otherwise dont e to early bc the passive will keep the enemy slowed as long as your e is not on cd

Q, then AA behind them. Shaco's passive gives you more damage if you stab people in the back with your AA and there's a damage bonus for AA-ing right out of the Q, so the way I usually do it is this:

Q into lane, AA them from behind (while invisible, revealing yourself), immediately W (box) behind the enemy to cut off their retreat if they have a slow enough reaction, then E to slow them down while you stab them in the back while they run back to safety. It'll be tempting to turret dive, but don't take the bait - one of the best parts about Shaco is his potential to only die once or twice in the game. It's beneficial to burn a laner's flash or even make them go back from a gank, especially in the early laning phase.

I definitely recommend that you check out  Shaclone on Youtube, or NightBlue3 on twitch. They are bot high elo shaco players. 

Hope this helps! {{champion:35}}
